name: Rescue Rover
description: Your dog and best friend, Rover, is snatched up by evil Robots. You must journey through 30 mind-bending, deadly Robot Rooms and rescue him. Each room is fraught with dangerous traps that only the bravest and most clever person in the world could manage to evade. For Rover's sake, it better be you. Get Rover and get out of there, or the cute little pup gets it!
